name: What Lies Beneath (ieatlight)
description:
This game was my first attempt at creating a short narrative-driven experience in the game development engine Bitsy.

The goal of the game is to make your way into the house's basement, and venture deeper into the murky truth of your family's past.

Use arrow keys to move, and the enter key to progress dialogue (to make sure not to skip dialogue accidentally).

The game is fairly short, could take from 5-10 minutes to complete, maybe longer in some cases.

I had a lot of fun making it, so I hope you have as much fun playing it. Enjoy!
